Member Function Documentation

virtual StringHashMapVector gaia::ui::ISimpleListItemProvider::Filter::performFiltering ( const gaia::base::String &  constraint,
const StringHashMapVector &  data 
) [pure virtual]

Invoked in a worker thread to filter the data according to the constraint.

Subclasses must implement this method to perform the filtering operation.

Parameters:
constraintthe constraint used to filter the data
dataThe HashMap contain the data for each row
Returns:
the results of the filtering operation
